```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(asthma)
data("test")
y <- c("ASTHMA")
x <- c("AGE")
cov <- c("PA","BMI")
cor_name <- c("PA","BMI","AGE")
ln_name <- c("AGE")
fc_name <- c("ASTHMA")
family <- "binomial"

data <- test
```

```{r describe}
describe(x,y,cov,data)
```
```{r data_pre}
data_pre(ln_name,fc_name,data)
```

```{r his_plot}
his_plot(x,"title","xlab","ylab",data)
```
```{r cor_plot}
cor_plot(cor_name,data)
```
```{r glm_process}
glm_process(x,y,cov,family,data)
```
